message: Possible value of height ranges from 40 cm to 215 cm
Possible value of Weight ranges from 30 Kg to 180 Kg.
Possible value of weight ranges from 30 Kg to 180 Kg.
Possible value of of Number of pregnancies gravida ranges from 1 to 15

conceptName: DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions
message: Number of miscarriages and/or abortions should be less than Number of pregnancies gravida

maxValue: DAK, Number of pregnancies gravida - DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions
message: Number of live births should be less than difference of Number of pregnancies gravida and Number of miscarriages or abortions

maxValue: DAK, Number of pregnancies gravida - DAK, Number of miscarriages or abortions - DAK, Number of live births
message: Number of stillbirths should be less than than diffrence of Number of pregnancies gravida and Number of miscarriages or abortions and Number of live births
Number of caesarian sections should be less than Parity
Possible value of Systolic blood pressure ranges from 60mmHg to 280mmHg.
Possible value of Repeat systolic blood pressure ranges from 60mmHg to 280mmHg.

conceptName: DAK, Repeat systolic blood pressure after 15 min
message: Possible value of Repeat systolic blood pressure ranges from 60mmHg to 280mmHg.
Possible value of Diastolic blood pressure ranges from 40mmHg to 200mmHg.
Possible value of Repeat diastolic blood pressure ranges from 40mmHg to 200mmHg.

conceptName: DAK, Repeat diastolic blood pressure after 15 min
message: Possible value of Repeat diastolic blood pressure ranges from 40mmHg to 200mmHg.
Possible value of of Body temperature ranges from 25°c to 46°c.
Possible value of Pulse rate ranges from 40bpm to 220bpm.
Possible value of second pulse rate ranges from 40bpm to 220bpm
Possible value of Respiratory rate ranges from 8bpm and 40bpm.
Possible value of Oxygen Saturation ranges from between 0% and 100%.
Possible value of Cervical dilation ranges from 0cm to 10cm.
Possible value of Fundal Height (wks) ranges from 20 and 44 wks.
Possible value of number of fetuses the woman is carrying ranges from 1 to 8.
Possible value of ANC contact number ranges from 2 to 14.

conceptName: DAK, Amount of daily aspirin prescribed until delivery
message: Amount of daily aspirin prescribed until delivery should be 75mg

conceptName: DAK, Fasting Blood sugar test result
message: Possible value of Fasting Blood sugar test result ranges from 30 to 500.
Possible value of Blood haemoglobin test result ranges from 0 to 25.
Possible value of Gestational age ranges from 4 to 40.
Birth weight in range of 1 and 10 KG is acceptable

conceptName: Gestational Age Days in Current Week
message: Possible value of the number of days must ranges from 0 to 6.
Possible value of MUAC ranges from 11 cm to 47 cm.
The hematocrit level has to be between 27% and 32.7%
The hematocrit level has to be between 21% and 26.7%!
The hematocrit level has to be less than 21%
